articles.description: Members of the Communication Workers Union have held a series of walkouts, which Royal Mail claims have cost it in excess of £100m
articles.content:
Royal Mail workers have been involved in widespread strike action in recent months, as part of a long-running dispute over jobs, pay and conditions.
Members of the Communication Workers Union (CWU) … [+3332 chars]
